name: C - BOT
description:
What is this game about?

C - BOT is a game whose main character is a small robot. His mission is to bring colors back to the world. To do this, he will need to collect all the color keys and repair his friend. You will find 5 different and interesting levels, unusual game mechanics and an interesting visual style of graphics.

Main game mechanics

The game world is teetering between black and white. When the world is painted white, you can see only a part of the blocks needed to complete the level. In the same way, everything works when the world is painted black. To pass the level you will have to visit the white and black world. The color of the level switches after a fixed time, which is written in the upper right corner of the screen. In each level, the colors change at different times, sometimes faster and sometimes slower. Be careful and decide quickly!

How to play C - BOT?

C - BOT supports both the keyboard and gamepad. The gamepad can be from both Xbox and PlayStation, but you can’t use the menu with the gamepad, you need a PC mouse for this.

Keyboard

Move left -  A 

Move right - D 

Jump - Space 

Fullscreen - F

Controller

Move left, Right - Left stick

Jump - A, Dualshock cross

Fullscreen - Select, Dualshock share

Information from developers

We want to know if you liked our game or not! Do not be afraid to write reviews, we know that our games are far from perfect and we will be happy to find out exactly what the problem is. Thank you for playing our games!
